name: Two worlds (itch) (bnmann, michalchwesiuk)
description:
A simple platformed game made from scratch using OpenGL , GLFW and OpenAL libraries.

Every ten seconds the world changes and different things appear. Use them to your advantage to get to the Golden Circle.

There are seven levels in the game .

Use A and D keys to move , W key to jump.

All assets were created by hand for the TK game jam.

Authors : Bartlomiej Neumann and Michal Chwesiuk
